text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a QUAL

name: RoleClassQualifiedEntity
title: RoleClassQualifiedEntity
description: An entity (player) that has been recognized as having certain training/experience or other characteristics that would make said entity an appropriate performer for a certain activity. The scoper is an organization that educates or qualifies entities.
